definitions: the office or position of being the elected executive head of a state of the US

examples.text: his campaign for the governorship of California

shortDefinitions: office or position of being governor of town or region

definitions: the office or position of being governor of a town, region, or public institution
shortDefinitions: office or position of being elected executive head of state of US

definitions: the office or position of being the representative of the British Crown in a colony or in a Commonwealth state that regards the monarch as head of state

examples.text: the governorship of Bermuda was traditionally one of the most prestigious posts

shortDefinitions: office or position of being representative of British Crown in colony or in Commonwealth state
